objects.description: [Cinnamon Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1021) has exploited multiple unpatched vulnerabilities for initial access including vulnerabilities in Microsoft Exchange, Manage Engine AdSelfService Plus, Confluence, and Log4j.(Citation: Microsoft Ransomware as a Service)(Citation: Microsoft Log4j Vulnerability Exploitation December 2021)(Citation: Sygnia Emperor Dragonfly October 2022)(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022)
